General.Name: Olympique Lyonnais Groupe SA
General.Description: Olympique Lyonnais Groupe SA, together with its subsidiaries, operates in the entertainment and media sector in France. The company manages the Olympique Lyonnais football club and operates Groupama stadium. It also markets, distributes, and retails derivative products under the Olympique Lyonnais brand; and produces television programs and corporate films, advertisements, events-based programs, and documentaries. In addition, the company is involved in ticketing, sponsoring and advertising, media and marketing rights, and player trading businesses. Further, it organizes various events, such as concerts, non-football sporting events, conventions, B2B seminars and corporate events, stadium tours, etc. The company was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Décines-Charpieu, France. As of December 19, 2022, Olympique Lyonnais Groupe SA operates as a subsidiary of Eagle Football LLC.
